package.name: myPOS_Virtual
package.summary: Accept card payments in few easy steps! Try our simple and secure checkout solution for European merchants.
package.description:
myPOS Virtual is an extension especially designed for European-based merchants who need a simple and secure complete checkout solution. Start accepting credit and debit card payments at your online store in few easy steps.
By using myPOS Virtual you enjoy a checkout extension backed-up by a comprehensive free merchant account with multiple currencies and an IBAN in Luxembourg.
package.notes: Fixed an error when tax is applied. Changed fields info text in the administration.
